ygData.messageBody:
Fling, Kirby writes:

> Now, with all that said... does anybody else think that necros are vastly
> overpowered? They do FAR more damage than any other class at all levels,
> they get pretty much every combat-utility spell that any other class gets
> (like roots, disempowers, debuffs, etc), AND get the ability to summon pets
> of higher level than any other class.

*LOL* How many necros have you played? Their pets are *vastly*
inferior to mage pets. Vastly.

They also have to research their mid-high level pets.

They are hated in almost all but 3 cities.

> Somebody tell me what the drawback is for their class... being hated
> by some NPCs? After having played a troll for several months and
> being KOS by EVERY npc north of innothule.... the necros have it
> easy... like super-easy.

*laugh* Uh-huh. What makes you think the DE necros have it any
easier? Or human or eru necros which are viewed with distaste IN
THEIR OWN CITY?


> Then they went and gimped the shamans and I just honestly can't
> figure out what is going on. I'm guessing I'm not seeing the whole
> picture or something.... because recent events just haven't made any
> sense to this stupid troll.

Cutting down a 1600(!) damage spell is HARDLY "gimping" unless you are
a 100% kiter. Are you?
